name: VNCircle
desc: An immutable, two-dimensional circle represented by its center point and radius.

items.name: init(center: VNPoint, radius: Double)
items.desc: Creates a circle with the specified center and radius.

items.name: init(center: VNPoint, diameter: Double)
items.desc: Creates a circle with the specified center and diameter.

items.name: class var zero: VNCircle
items.desc: A circle object centered at the origin, with a radius of zero.

items.name: func contains(VNPoint) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines if this circle, including its boundary, contains the specified point.

items.name: func contains(VNPoint, inCircumferentialRingOfWidth: Double) -> Bool
items.desc: Determines if a ring around this circle’s circumference contains the specified point.
